name: Heavy Water
description:
1. Click on large buildings to start giving out water.
  2. Click water on tucks and parachutes to refill your supply.
  3. Give out as many bottles as possible before the time runs out.
  4. Help the citizens living with the #FlintWaterCrisis by donating water, money, or time.

Learn more about the #FlintWaterCrisis from the ACLU of Michigan.
